document_data.mainbody:
The Star of Mo-Pelar was a star gem gifted by the wizard Martek to the Pharaoh Amun-Re of Bakar.
The Star of Mo-Pelar was a fist-sized opal. It was one of the five Star Gems of Martek. 
The Star of Mo-Pelar had the same powers as a gem of true seeing.
The wizard Martek gave the star gem to the pharaoh Amun-Re of the house of Mo-Pelar, who had it placed in his tomb. The pharaoh would later use the Star Gem as part of a death curse uttered in Osiris name which dried the River Athis this barred his soul from the afterlife. The curse stayed in place until adventurers retrieved the Star of Mo-Pelar in , using it to restore Martek to life.
*Martek
*Amun-Re
